snippet: New measures that cover thousands of facilities, including recruitment centers like the one targeted in Chatanooga, Tenn., provide rules to improve safety.
abstract: Military officials order increased security at recruiting centers and all of its other United States facilities after four Marines and Navy petty officer were killed in shooting rampage in Chattanooga, Tenn.
lead_paragraph: New measures that cover thousands of facilities, including recruitment centers like the one targeted in Chatanooga, Tenn., provide rules to improve safety.

headline.main: Military Has Security Tightened for Recruiters After Chattanooga Shooting
headline.print_headline: Military Tightens Security at Thousands of Sites, Including Recruitment Centers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
